participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Determined and ambitious, always striving for excellence in everything she does.
participant_1.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys sharing experiences and making new friends.
participant_2.background: i like riding horses. i will graduate from high school in two years. my bedroom is purple and lime green. i'm a vegan. i've brown curly hair.

content.text: Hiya! i love to go to the city and visit my family.
